item.title: Contact
item.description:
The quickest way to reach me would be to e-mail petro <at> podrezo <dot> com. I am also on LinkedIn. My PGP fingerprint is C6C104E85A8E10D53864FEB62409464983B10004.

  Download my primary public key

item.title: Babel Badger (Deprecated)
item.description: A telegram bot that translates messages using ChatGPT.

item.description: Climbing up the ranks can be tough, but very rewarding.

item.title: How to Rock an Online Presentation
item.description: Discover how to transform your next online presentation from a monologue to a dialogue, engaging audiences in a way they never forget

item.description: A Chrome extension that generates icebreaker questions for team meetings.

item.title: Jira Connector for Google Data Studio
item.description: This community connector enables Google Data Studio to crunch Kanban-type statistics like lead time directly from Jira’s API.
